html: Quizzed HMRC leadership today @CommonsTreasury. They were clear: - no need for any infrastructure whatever at Irish border in any scenario - no instructions to introduce it - any new arrangements can be ready in 24 months from point of clarity So why do we need the #backstop?
text:
Quizzed HMRC leadership today @CommonsTreasury. They were clear:
- no need for any infrastructure whatever at Irish border in any scenario
- no instructions to introduce it
- any new arrangements can be ready in 24 months from point of clarity
So why do we need the #backstop?

html: Hammond states he won’t publish the data modelling used in the Treasury’s forecasts because “until we have the deal, we can’t possibly know what assumptions we’ll need to make” And yet the assumptions that are being requested, are those already being used to fuel #ProjectFear pic.twitter.com/sGaGMtlzm6
text:
Hammond states he won’t publish the data modelling used in the Treasury’s forecasts because “until we have the deal, we can’t possibly know what assumptions we’ll need to make”

*64 convictions
*Sentences totalling 85 years
